subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Natasha Kai scored twice and Abby Wambach added a goal in the United States women’s team’s 3-1 victory over host Mexico that moved the Americans a victory from securing a spot in the Beijing Olympics.
snippet: Natasha Kai scored twice and Abby Wambach added a goal in the United States women’s team’s 3-1 victory over host Mexico that moved the Americans a victory from securing a spot in the Beijing Olympics.
